categories.category: Companies listed on the London Stock Exchange
Health care companies of the United Kingdom

parameters.services: Sterilisation and decontamination of medical instruments, contract laundry for healthcare providers, laboratory consultancy, pathology and drug testing
parameters.key_people:
Stephen Wilson,
Chairman
Richard Steeves, CEO

bdy.p:
Synergy Health plc (formerly Synergy Healthcare,
LSE
: SYR) is a
United Kingdom
-based company which provides hygiene, sanitation and consultancy products and services to the healthcare and laboratory research industries. The company is headquartered in
Swindon , Wiltshire. Its services include the sterilisation of reusable medical instruments and linen cleaning outsourcing. Synergy also distributes medical hygiene products such as antibacterial cleansers and wet wipes, swabs and bandages. The company is listed on the
London Stock Exchange
a member of the
FTSE 250 Index
as of September 2008.

sec.p:
The Company was founded in 1991. It was first listed on the
Alternative Investment Market
in 2001. It went on to buy Shiloh, a leading supplier of sterilisation services to the National Health Service, in 2005.1 In 2007 it opened an office in
Dubai , secured a sterilisation contract in
Belgium and expanded its facilities in China.2 It secured a full listing on the
London Stock Exchange
in 2008.

The Company provides the following services:
Decontamination
Sterilisation
Healthcare solutions
Linen management
Laboratory services

It also offers the following product solutions:
Infection prevention and control
Patient hygene
Surgical solutions
Wound management

entry.weblink: Synergy Healthcare takes a risk with £8.7m Shiloh deal

reflist.entry: " Annual Report 2007". Synergy Health. Retrieved on 2008-09-22.
